challenge.title: 10-Day Better Sleep Challenge
challenge.description: Transform your sleep habits in just 10 days with our scientifically-backed daily challenges.

days.title: Set Your Sleep Schedule
days.description: Choose a consistent bedtime and wake time, even on weekends.

days.title: Create a Wind-Down Routine
days.description: Develop a 30-minute pre-sleep routine to signal your body it's time to rest.

days.title: Optimize Your Environment
days.description: Make your bedroom cool, dark, and quiet for optimal sleep conditions.

days.title: Digital Detox
days.description: No screens 1 hour before bed. Try reading or meditation instead.

days.title: Morning Light Exposure
days.description: Get 10-15 minutes of natural sunlight within an hour of waking.

days.title: Afternoon Energy Boost
days.description: No caffeine after 2 PM. Switch to herbal tea or water.

days.title: Evening Exercise
days.description: Light stretching or yoga 2-3 hours before bed to release tension.

days.title: Mindful Eating
days.description: Avoid heavy meals 3 hours before bed. Light snacks only if needed.

days.title: Stress Management
days.description: Practice 10 minutes of deep breathing or journaling before bed.

days.title: Celebrate Your Progress
days.description: Reflect on your sleep improvements and commit to maintaining healthy habits.
